messages.subject: SHQ New Look and Technical Issues
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, As I mentioned before http://www.ai-dax.com donated a new template for us...  you can take a look here http://www.shinsengumihq.com however, my question
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
As I mentioned before http://www.ai-dax.com donated a new template
for us... you can take a look here http://www.shinsengumihq.com

however, my question to anyone out there is this:
-the SHQ server does have a database option
-SHQ has a shocking 79 pages (which over time may be reduced,
streamlined and consolidated whatever you call it)
-Does anyone know how to build a database driven website?
-if so can you just explain it to me? because I read stuff online
and it doesn't make sense (^_^) you can email me at secretarytocapt3
(a)hotmail.com we can set up a chat time

we got the info! (actually we are back logged 3 months, during this
entire time of NO UPDATES on SHQ.com people like Hirotada Tokugawa
and myself have amassed even more info...like alot really ^_^ as
usual we await more contributions from anyone on this list or the
general public, be it fan-work, fanfic fanart cosplay you name it,
you can post here, email the site and so forth)

we got the graphics! (the spiffy art)

but we need to make our site more "sleek"

if we can really do a good job with SHQ, future fans which may
arrive in the future won't have to start with point "A" (as we've
had to do), they can just read some of our pages and then move on
quickly to learn whatever they are most interested in...so we need a
strong layout to make that all happen

with a strong layout the webmaster can cut back time on the manual
work required in updating and instead use the time for research (I'm
down to like 6 months where I have access to a research library, so
for me personally I just want to get an understanding of the history-
--the manga and stuff I can buy LATER when I have money).

So if you see alot of "nerd" history stuff on SHQ, that is because I
am using what I have at my disposal. If you hear otherwise that SHQ
is not "into" pop-culture then it is a simple misunderstanding.

--------------------
General Announcement
--------------------
As you may know Youtube was purchased by Google, thus it discourages
the posting of copyright material
for example, if you post a clip of anime being broadcasted in
Japan---you will get in trouble etc etc
we don't want anyone to have to deal with legal issues (^_^)

Even though Youtube's upcoming policy and strict enforcement will
really annoy many of us---this may force us to create our own
Shinsengumi films

oh no...Shinsengumi finger puppets (^_^)
